committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution providing for the designation of the week beginning October 9, 1977, and ending October 15, 1977, as National Gifted and Talented Children's Week.

summary.text: Requests the President to issue a proclamation designating the week beginning October 9, 1977, and ending October 15, 1977, as "National Gifted and Talented Children's Week."

titles.title: Joint resolution providing for the designation of the week beginning October 9, 1977, and ending October 15, 1977, as National Gifted and Talented Children's Week.
